item.description:
Hey guys...

FEW UPDATES HERE ..

I have a reservation for guided kayaking tour for a group of 20 people. This is going to be great experience to kayak in the charles river along the boston skyline. The total tour will be 2 hours long and if we are interested we can request the tour guides to take us into the harbor if time permitting.

 

Here is the link for getting your tickets:

https://www.paddleboston.com/bookings/availabledates.php?actCode=SKYLINE

P:S - This is first come first basis only, RSVping on the meetup does not guarantee a spot. So please get your spot.

 

Kayak will seat two people, so please bring along someone that you are comfortable sitting with for two hours..

If the weather is bad, the money is refunded in full. Let me know if you have another questions.
item.name: Kayaking
